title: Cool Lift Portable Notebook Cooling Pad
description:
Ever suffered from laptop notebook computer heat problems? The Cool Lift laptop stand is just for you. Designed to promote airflow, the Cool Lift laptop stand helps make your laptop as cool as you've always wanted.

Due to its angled design, it also promotes good posture, and helps prevent carpal tunnel. Works with all laptop sizes! The Cool Lift is designed for desktop use, not for use on a lap.
